geneticcode

Class Statement

  • java.lang.Object
    • geneticcode.Statement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Statement>

    public class Statement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Statement>
    This class represent a statement in the C language. It is represented as a list of strings.
